name: 華國媛
objective:
本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
Goals: 1) To know the structure and function of cells, 2) to understand how gene expression is controlled,and 3) to learn the biomaterials used in clinical applications.
schedule:

1　　Chapter 1:Introduction 
2　　Chapter 2:The Chemical Basis of Life
3　　Cell, Tissue & Organs
4　　Chapter 11: Utilization of Genetic Info: From Transcription to Translation
5　　Chapter 4: The Structure and Function of the Plasma Membrane

6　　Chapter 7: Interactions between Cells and Their Environment
7　　Chapter 15: Cell Signaling: Communication between Cells and Their Environment

8　　Immunity
9　　Midterm Exam
10　　“Bio”-materials: polymers in life
11　　Synthetic materials for medical application
12　　Host Reaction
13　　Artificial Organs

16　　Presentation 1
17　　Presentation 2

scorePolicy: Class participation (40%, absence: -5%), Midterm Exam (30%) & Final Presentation (30%)
materials: Biomaterials Science: An Introduction to Materials in Medicine, 2004 by Buddy Ratner.
